Package co.cask.cdap.api.workflow

For constructing workflows.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Workflow
    Defines an interface for the Workflow.
    WorkflowAction
    Represents an action that can be executed in a Workflow.
    WorkflowActionSpecification
    Specification for a WorkflowAction.
    WorkflowCompletion
    The WorkflowCompletion interface provides onSuccess() and onFailure() methods.
    WorkflowConditionConfigurer<T>
    Defines an interface for the conditions in the Workflow.
    WorkflowConfigurer
    Configurer for configuring the Workflow.
    WorkflowContext
    Represents the runtime context of a WorkflowAction.
    WorkflowForkConfigurer<T>
    Defines an interface for the fork in the Workflow.
    WorkflowToken
    Interface to represent the data that is transferred from one node to the next nodes in the Workflow.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractWorkflow
    Provides a default implementation of Workflow methods for easy extension.
    AbstractWorkflowAction  
    NodeValue
    Multiple nodes in the Workflow can add the same key to the WorkflowToken.
    ScheduleProgramInfo
    Represents name and type information of the program.
    Value
    Class representing the value of the key in the WorkflowToken.
    WorkflowActionNode
    Represents the ACTION node in the Workflow.
    WorkflowActionSpecification.Builder
    Builder class for building the WorkflowActionSpecification.
    WorkflowConditionNode
    Represents the CONDITION node in the Workflow.
    WorkflowForkNode
    Represents the FORK node in the Workflow
    WorkflowNode
    Represents node in the Workflow.
    WorkflowSpecification
    Specification for a Workflow
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    WorkflowNodeType
    Defines types of nodes in the Workflow.
    WorkflowToken.Scope
    Keys in the WorkflowToken can be added by user, using the WorkflowToken.put(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) method.

Package co.cask.cdap.api.workflow Description

For constructing workflows.
